body:
Comment 8: 
> Besides passing the tests, we need to worry a little about about switching
> between use of SSE2 and use of the 387. When you move from one to the other
> I believe you have to assume you just lost all the registers

That's correct when moving between 387 registers and MMX registers, but as far as I know
you can freely intermix use of the 387 and SSE registers.
